law.catch_line: Executive director of Commonwealth Office of Technology -- Roles and duties.

text.section: The executive director of the Commonwealth Office of Technology shall be the principal adviser to the Governor and the executive cabinet on information technology policy, including policy on the acquisition and management of information technology and resources.
